channel.title: Invisible Problem [P16 Source]
channel.description: Hello, I recently started an old server of mine back up just for fun and I realized that whenever I am weilding an item that belongs to the platebodies(not bodies,) my arms will appear invisible and my hands appear 1 tile infront of/ or behind me. Anyone know what the problem is or could direct me to a tutorial that could help? I'm using P16 as my server's source and Silab's version 3 client. Is it server-side or client-side? Much help appreciated :)

item.dc:creator: @ferraridude ferraridude

@ferraridude wrote:

My source is at least a year old so probably not :P. I’ll try that and report how it turns out.[quote=“playermanny2, post:2, topic:139906”]not sure, but do u have the updated item.java

and if u got that, try restarting client. that worked for me when my legs go invisble (or logging in and out)[/quote]

My source is at least a year old so probably not :P. I’ll try that and report how it turns out.

This problem is for males, too

@ferraridude wrote:

Hello, I recently started an old server of mine back up just for fun and I realized that whenever I am weilding an item that belongs to the platebodies(not bodies,) my arms will appear invisible and my hands appear 1 tile infront of/ or behind me. Anyone know what the problem is or could direct me to a tutorial that could help? I’m using P16 as my server’s source and Silab’s version 3 client. Is it server-side or client-side?
